text: Israel has become the first country to officially recognize Somaliland as a sovereign state
marking a significant shift in the region's diplomatic landscape
This move is seen as a strategic decision by Israel
which has been strengthening its ties with countries in the Horn of Africa in recent years
The recognition of Somaliland by Israel is a notable development
given that Somaliland has been seeking international recognition since it declared independence from Somalia in 1991
The Israeli government's decision is likely to have implications for the region
particularly in terms of trade and security cooperation
and may also influence the stance of other countries towards Somaliland's status
